text: Dr.K.V.P.Ramachandra Rao  (born 21 June 1948), is a Member of Parliament in India and chief adviser to the former chief minister of Andhra Pradesh Y. S. Rajasekhara Reddy. He belongs to Indian National Congress. He pressed for Y. S. Jagan Mohan Reddy to take on the post of Chief Minister.After Bifurcation of Andhra Pradesh he is allotted to Telangana state by draw of lots.
